Msg_failed_remove_playlist_entry:
Failed to remove the song from the playlist.
The playlist is set to the external synchronization mode.
Msg_warn_preview:
The following warnings occurred while preparing the preview.
Please check whether access to the file is possible.
The preview may be corrupted.
Msg_init_settings:
You have to perform the initial settings.
Please fill LR2 directory, 
output directory for custom folders,
install destination directory,
player settings, etc.
Msg_initsetting_completed:
Initial setting is completed. 
Next, full scan check of the BMS file will be performed.
This process may take several minutes.
PlaylistProp_ftype_desc: * If the response of folder opening/closing is slow, uncheck some of the above or turn off folder ramp function in LR2
Msg_hide_message: This message can be hidden on the setting dialog.
Msg_show_chart:
The BMS file is not registered on the web site.
Would you like to register the chart.
Load_from_insane_estimation_table: Load from 発狂BMS難度推定表
Msg_load_recommended_tables_readonly_mod:
's recommended songs will be loaded as a playlist
but not updated automatically.

You should update your recommendations with the official method.

Are you sure you want to continue?
Msg_error_preview:
The following error occurred while deleting the temporary file on the preview.
Please check whether access to the file is possible.
and delete the file manually.
If this problem is not temporary, your report may help the developer.
Msg_error_timeout_dblock_restore:
Restoration could not be started.
The database locking timed out.
Msg_init_column_settings: Are you sure you want to initialize column setting for this view?
Msg_remove_folder:
Are you sure you want to remove folder?
Songs in this folder will move to "No folder name" folder.
Msg_failed_playlist_backup: Failed to save the backup file.
Msg_download_ranking_cache: Are you sure you want to download LR2IR ranking cache data?
Msg_clear_pendings: Remove the following package from installation pendings.
Msg_failed_installation:
The target file is not found and
may not be installed correctly.
Msg_warn_play_temp_install:
LR2 cannot play the BMS file which is already installed
and to be installed to the other directory.
Are you sure to continue?
Msg_error_cache_download:
An error occurred while downloading LR2 ranking cache.
If this problem is not temporary, your report may help the developer.
Msg_remove_playlist: Are you sure you want to remove playlist?
Msg_warn_cache_download:
The download function of the ranking data is turned off
because the score DB is not connected or the player is 
not registered in LR2IR.
Msg_failed_create_playlist_folder:
Failed to create the folder.
The playlist is set to the external synchronization mode.
Msg_error_timeout_dblock_uninstall:
Uninstallation could not be started.
The database locking timed out.
Msg_warn_playlist_backup: There is no playlist, so you do not need to back it up.
Msg_move_to_recycle:
The BMS file will be moved to recycle bin
and removed from the DB.

Are you sure you want to continue?

Msg_register_chart: Are you sure you want to register selected charts?
Msg_ranking_cache_notfound:
The ranking data is already newer than the cache
 or no data was found on cache server.

Msg_clear_all_pendings: Are you sure you want to clear all pending folders?

and removed from the DB.

Msg_rename_folders:
All BMS folders will be renamed automatically.
This operation cannot be reverted.

Are you sure you want to continue?
Msg_load_recommended_tables_update_mode:
's recommended songs will be loaded as a playlist
and update automatically by the local LR2 clear data.

Be carefull when you do not send your clears on purpose.

Note that your clears and scores will not send to LR2IR.
You can recover the data by the official update method if you have a problem.

Are you sure you want to continue?
Msg_override_level_error_recommended: This operation is not available for recommended folder.
Playlist_output_note:
Playlists are saved to "Output (normal folder)" directory.
You can also set specify playlists to be able to quickly access from the LR2 music select.
Those playlists are saved to "Output (root folder)" directory.
You need to specify a different location for each of the two custom folder outputs.
Playlist_output_desc: * Do not include important data in custom folder outputs
Details_test_notscan: [TEST] Not scan all BMS files at startup

Msg_failed_playlist_restore:
Failed to restore from backup.

Details_test_notcalc_offrank: [TEST] Not calculate offline score ranking estimation
Msg_merge_bms_folder:
All files will be moved to the destination
to merge without dupilicates.

Note that this may cause that sound files 
in different formats (.ogg/.wav) to be mixed together.
Msg_success_playlist_backup: The backup file was successfully saved.
Msg_fix_installation:
Only BMS file will be moved to re-installation location.
If the BMS file requires additional files, eg. audios or images,
this function cannot detect that.

Are you sure you want to continute?

The playlist defined levels will be shown in LR2 music select.

Msg_manual_installation:
The BMS package will be installed to estimated folder.

Note that:
Already installed BMS file will be skipped.
Overwrite all files except BMS files.
BMS files may be renamed to avoid overwrite.
